data_table.description: Cognitive Function Test - Mini Mental State Exam (MMSE), Original Cohort Exam 17 through Exam 32. The MMSE is a screening tool used to detect deficits/decline in cognitive function. The maximum number of points is 30. Also this is the earliest version of this test.

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Unique study participant identification number

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study cohort identifier
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant ID number.

variable.name: exam
variable.description: EXAM NUMBER

variable.name: examdate
variable.description: EXAM DATE
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.

variable.name: world
variable.description: SPELL THE WORD "WORLD" BACKWARDS
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test or no try

variable.name: mm_1
variable.description: WHAT IS THE DATE TODAY (MONTH, DAY, YEAR)? (SCORE 1 POINT FOR EACH CORRECT RESPONSE)
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test or no try

variable.name: mm_2
variable.description: WHAT IS THE SEASON? (SCORE 1 POINT FOR EACH CORRECT RESPONSE)
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test or no try

variable.name: mm_3
variable.description: WHAT DAY OF THE WEEK IS IT? (SCORE 1 POINT FOR EACH CORRECT RESPONSE)
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test or no try

variable.name: mm_4
variable.description: WHAT TOWN, COUNTY AND STATE ARE WE IN?(SCORE 1 POINT FOR EACH CORRECT RESPONSE)
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test or no try

variable.name: mm_5
variable.description: WHAT IS THE NAME OF THIS PLACE? (SCORE 1 POINT FOR EACH CORRECT RESPONSE)
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test or no try

variable.name: mm_6
variable.description: WHAT FLOOR OF THE BUILDING ARE WE ON? (SCORE 1 POINT FOR EACH CORRECT RESPONSE)
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test or no try

variable.name: mm_7
variable.description: REPEAT BACK THREE OBJECTS I NAME (SCORE 1 POINT FOR EACH CORRECT RESPONSE)
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test or no try

variable.name: mm_8
variable.description: NAME 3 OBJECTS I ASKED YOU (SCORE 1 POINT FOR EACH CORRECT RESPONSE)
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test or no try

variable.name: mm_9
variable.description: WHAT IS THIS CALLED (WATCH)?
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test or no try

variable.name: mm_10
variable.description: WHAT IS THIS CALLED (PENCIL)?
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test or no try

variable.name: mm_11
variable.description: REPEAT--"NO IFS, ANDS, OR BUTS." (SCORE 1 POINT FOR PERFECT RESPONSE)
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test or no try

variable.name: mm_12
variable.description: READ FOLLOWING & DO WHAT SAYS (SCORE 1 POINT IF PERFORMED)
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test or no try

variable.name: mm_13
variable.description: PLEASE WRITE A SENTENCE (SCORE 1 POINT IF PERFORMED)
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test or no try

variable.name: mm_14
variable.description: PLEASE COPY THIS DRAWING (SCORE 1 POINT IF PERFORMED)
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test or no try

variable.name: mm_15
variable.description: TAKE THIS PIECE OF PAPER IN RIGHT HAND, FOLD IT IN HALF WITH BOTH HAND, AND PUT IT IN YOUR LAP (SCORE 1 POINT FOR EACH CORRECTLY PERFORMED ACT)
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test or no try

variable.name: cogscr
variable.description: TOTAL SCORE FOR MMSE COGNITIVE FUNCTION TEST
variable.comment: If the test was administered and the participant answered less than 8 questions, then COGSCR is set to unknown. Please refer to protocol for algorithm.

variable.name: maxcog
variable.description: MAXIMUM SCORE BASED ON THE QUESTIONS ANSWERED
variable.comment: 9-30 is the range of the maximum score a participant could get based on the number of questions answered. For example, if a participant did not answer a 5 point question, the maximum score would be 25.
